name: 2015 The 3rd Asia -Pacific Conference on Business & Social Science
content: The 3rd Asia-Pacific Conference on Business and Social Science (APCBSS 2015) is scheduled to take place in Chiang Mai, Thailand from 18th to 20th of November in 2015\. This conference aims to provide a communication platform for academics, researchers, graduates and industry professionals to not only present their recent and latest researches but also share their thoughts and discuss the future development in the field of business and social science. We sincerely invite contribution in the field of information and management. Papers submitted will be reviewed and notified in groups and in sequence.
